Banner.Description: I'm a cypherpunk computer engineer passionate about blockchain and web development. I'm building amazing solutions that try to improve this fast changing world.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Being a full-stack blockchain developer requires me to be a continuous learner as the space moves much quicker than my knowledge about it. However, I find learning as one of the biggest pleasures in my life along with going to the gym, playing videogames, raving and spending time with family and friends.
I also have experience developing traditional finance systems for wholesale banking and data reconciliation scripts.
I love working with new and disruptive technologies that have the power to change how we interact with money, things and people.
Some of the technologies that I have used include:
Experience.Title: Studies & Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Full-Stack developer
Description: Design & development of the Vysion platform. A cyberintelligence platform that allows users to monitor and analyze the dark web for threats to their organization.
Working in a small 5 person remote team.
Typescript, Next.js, Python, FastApi, Selenium, Elasticsearch, AWS, UI/UX

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full-Stack blockchain developer
Description: Development of the Virtual Persona project. A Web 3.0 marketplace buy, sell or create tokenized avatars ready for multiple metaverses and EVM-compatible blockchains.
Development of the CA-Marketplace smart contract, integration of frontend and backend systems with the supported chains.
Development of Web3 projects for external clients such as NFT collections and DAOs.
Working in a 10 person Scrum team.
Hardhat, Solidity, Typescript, Ethers.js, Angular, Nest.js, OpenZeppelin, Next.js

Experience.Jobs.Title: Master's Degree in Blockchain
Description: Master's degree taken at Universidad Europea, a prestigious Spanish private university.
Learnt how to develop blockchain systems using Solidity and deploying them on various EVM-compatible blockchains such as Ethereum, Polygon and Avalanche.
Created nodes of the main blockchain networks such as Bitcoin, Ethereum and Hyperledger Fabric.
My final master's degree project was Gastroo, a Web 3.0 Dapp that allows foodies to monetize their culinary contents by creating NFTs with their recipes embedded into them.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Consultant
Description: Development and maintenance of wholesale banking systems for BBVA, a Spanish multinational bank.
Developed frontend and backend systems using Java, Kotlin and PHP.
Creation of data reconciliation scripts using Python and the Pandas library.
MySQL, Oracle, Bitbucket, Jira, Jenkins, Unix etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Computer Engineering
Description: Engineering degree taken at Universidad de Alcal√°, a Spanish public university.

The most challenging 4 years of my life, in which I developed a great variety of projects, some of which include a self-driving car controller using ADA and the TORCS simulator, a compiler for a custom programming language written in Java and a fast-food restaurant app using Android Studio.

As my final degree project, I developed a prototype on FreeRTOS and RISC-V of the application software of the EPD ICU onboard Solar Orbiter. The EPD ICU is a device used to measure the solar wind and the magnetic field of the Sun and it's mounted on Solar Orbiter, a mission of the European Space Agency.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Latest Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Vysion
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Cyberintelligence platform that allows users to monitor and analyze the dark web for threats to their organization.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Forbes Legacy Pass
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Landing page for the oficial Forbes Legacy Pass NFT collection.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Virtual Persona
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web 3.0 marketplace where anyone can buy tokenized avatars ready for multiple metaverses and EVM-compatible blockchains.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CryptoAvatars
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Online toolset for tokenized & interoperable avatar creation.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: ViBite
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Online food delivery service platform aggregator built using SvelteKit & Firebase.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Gastroo
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web 3.0 Dapp that allows foodies to monetize their culinary contents by creating NFTs with their recipes embedded into them.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: BBVA Risks Reconciliation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Internal tool used by BBVA to detect and study discrepancies in operational imports between front and back office systems.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Rust Portfolio
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This same site but built in Rust using the Yew.rs framework. This was meant to be a sample demo project for me to better understand Rust's WebAssembly capabilities.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Halo Weapons NFT
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A simple demo project in which a user can mint Opensea-compatible NFTs with 3D models of Halo weapons embedded into them.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Algo Address Tracker
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Real-time monitoring dashboard for Algorand account balances.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: InstantEat
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple Android app that allows users to order food from various restaurants, pay using various payment methods and track their order in real time. It was meant to demonstrate the use of different design patterns.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Vega SDK
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: SDK with custom LPUART functionality for the OpenISA Vegaboard. Used to develop the Solar Orbiter FreeRTOS EPD ICU port from my final degree project.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Compiler
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: University project for the Compilers class. Implements a compiler for a custom language written in Java. It uses ANTLR to parse the language and LLVM to generate the code.

Contact.Title: Get in touch
Contact.Content: My inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
